name: Killem Thingy
description:
Killem Thingy 

-Top down shooter

-Fight Waves of zombies, fight last wave to win

-Try to beat your last best time

-Press Tab to buy upgrades for your weapon and character and buy bandages and ammo

Move with AWSD

Fire with L.Mouse click

Reload with 'R' key

--- DISCLAIMER --

The game is just a prototype idea, and testing new concepts I currently have been learning, since I am a amateur game dev.

Everything is a placeholder at the moment. This project is more of a practise on coding rather than actually polished game

Thanks for playing!
